titleStmt.title: A declaration, for the strict discipline of the army, and due payment of quarters
titleStmt.author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Kensington this eleventh day of March, 1694, in the seventh year of our reign.
